name: The Necromancer's Guide To: Amalgams
description:
Take the role of an Amalgam, the undead-body fueled blob monster created by bumbling necromancer Zarkov for the purpose of destroying all of his previous Amalgams currently rampaging around his crypt.

Crush undead, add there bodies to your own mass. Assemble a rolling, spinning abomination that shoots fire from it's DIY limbs and swings a hammer made of fossilized wizards(maybe don't use wizards, they have low hp).

Learn to play through the campaign and experience what could be charity described as a story and tepidly called comedy.

Or put your blob building skills to the test in the endless mode which was thrown together in an hour.

Did I mention this was a game jam game? I probably should have led with that.

Game by Owen Ryan

Voice Acting by Colm Ryan

Music by Dean M.

Literally every art asset from 16 x 16 Dungeon Tileset II by 0x72

Made for Flip's Art Kit Game Jam.
